Name: Dragon Blossom
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Syrup from Luxardo Maraschino Cherries
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Light, aromatic, semi-sweet and distinctly oriental in style.
Nutrition: One serving of Dragon Blossom contains 183 calories
